message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.DB

Reasoning: The paper discusses the use of topic models to extract latent semantic themes from a collection of research documents, which is a common task in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of MapReduce framework to solve scalability issues is also relevant to large-scale data processing (cs.DB). The implementation of the Correlated Topic Model (CTM) with variational Expectation-Maximization (EM) algorithm is a machine learning approach, which falls under the categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and deep learning (cs.DL).
